title: PBE
body: Hello im greekashe12345 from eune and im waiting 3 years for pbe!!! Plz tell me if u accept me or not cuze I have wait too much I know u need players with good chat (im not toxic for the god) but I cant wait more I want to test almost 100things but I cant! ACCEPT ME OR NOT TELL ME PLZ :(

replies.body: While I can see you've applied to the PBE, I don't have any details on the status of your acceptance to provide.  We can't force an application through or have details on how to get accepted beyond the [PBE Faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Good luck!
